Watch: Mamata Banerjee's interview with Times Now | http://t.co/ECXMwGuRc6
I am very open to working with all; country comes first. No problem at all... I can work with all... With everyone: WB CM
Bengal is my soil. I started my career from there. Govt cannot work from Delhi, it must go to the people: WB CM
Politicians should come from the grassroots level: WB CM
My party is a collective family. The party decides who will work for the organisation: WB CM
I am very media friendly. But if media distorts the news, it is unfair: WB CM
There is no problem if any hard line Leftists choose to join the mainstream. We must encourage them to give up violence: WB CM
In the name of Maoism, killing people and bloodshed is totally wrong: WB CM
From about 400 the death toll due to Maoist violence in Jangalmahal has come down to 0: WB CM
Anna ji is supporting a political party for the first time. If he is giving his blessings to us, what is the problem - WB CM
The Centre is taking away our revenue. They have stopped funds for most schemes. They have lost all credibility to rule: WB CM
I can comment against individual politicians. I can criticise political parties: WB CM
I am happy with my position. For 34 years there has been no development. I want to work for the people: WB CM
I do not care for the chair. I care for the people: WB CM
I want political stability. I want economic stability. We need change in the system: WB CM
Everything will be decided after the elections, based on the mandate of the people: WB CM
We can play a key role in national politics. I am open to working with anyone who supports strengthening federal structure: WB CM
Why should we be confined to Bengal? This is my motherland and I will fight election in any state: WB CM
We have MLAs in states outside Bengal. We will also fight Lok Sabha elections outside the State: WB CM
India is a land of great diversities. Many people of different religions, caste and creed live together. United India is our motto: WB CM
There have been communal riots in Uttar Pradesh and Assam also. We do not support these: WB CM
I do not support communal violence. We are fighting against both Congress and BJP: WB CM
The way I have maintained my principles, no one can: WB CM
I cannot compromise on my credentials: WB CM
We have pulled out of coalitions because of ideological issues. We cannot go against our manifesto: WB CM
I know my limitations. Let the people decide. Who will be the PM, will be decided after elections: WB CM
If you think nobody is with me, let me tell you, the power of the people is with me: WB CM
I cannot impose my ideology on other parties. If anybody wants to join us, they are welcome: WB CM
It (the Third Front) is just a tea party: WB CM
The Left is left out from politics. They are the most opportunist party. They have lost their ideology: WB CM
We cannot run the country sitting in Delhi. We have conducted 54 block level administrative meetings. No other Govt has done that: WB CM
Third Front is a tired front. I want to see the federal structure strengthened for the sake of the states: WB CM
The political scene is dominated by Congress and BJP. They are together. We have seen it during Telangana Bill in Parliament: WB CM
Do not underestimate us. People will decide the fate of the country: WB CM
I do not think only this election is important, and other elections are not. I cannot say that I want to be the PM. Let people decide: WB CM
Anna ji is not a political figure. He is an elederly man. He is a father figure: WB CM
Aam Admy Party is a new party. I cannot comment on them: WB CM
There should be electoral reforms. Many countries have state-funded elections. Why India cannot? We need to change political system: WB CM
People are with us. But our minus point is we do not have the money to fight elections: WB CM
We have announced the list of candidates for Bengal, Tripura, Jharkhand and Manipur. We will announce more candidates soon: WB CM

Thanks for this opportunity to interact with my Facebook friends. Hope this is done in future too: Didi signs off. #FacebookTalksLive
We are involving private players for the development projects. We have PPP policy: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
We have started awareness programmes for women's safety at school level. We will also start it at college level: WB CM #FacebookTalksLive
I would be happy if the number of crimes against women comes down to zero: WB CM #FacebookTalksLive
Earlier, FIRs were not taken for instances of violence against women. Now women freely lodge complaints: WB CM #FacebookTalksLive
There are a lot of incidents of communal riots in UP and Assam. That must be controlled: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
I learn from disagreements. This is a democratic country: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
I am not a feminist. I am a human being and I want to take my brothers and sisters along together: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
If good candidates with impeccable credentials have the money to fight elections, i will be happy to give them my party symbol: Didi
Our credibility is our strength, but we are a poor party: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
If we do not build the new generation, who will be the future of the country: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
The youth must come up to join politics. There will be no vision, no change if new people do not join politics: Didi #FacebookTalksLive
We started Kanyashree scheme for women empowerment. It will give annual monetary benefit to girls for pursuing education: WB CM
Out of 14 Zilla Parishads held by Trinamool, 8 Sabhadhipatis are women: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
We have given 50% reservation for women at local bodies in Bengal: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
In MSME, growth in credit flow from banks for Bengal was 105% while for Gujarat it was less than 50%: WB CM #FacebookTalksLive
Gujarat got a lot of Central help after earthquake. Their population is also less. They cannot be compared to us: WB CM #FacebookTalksLive
You cannot one state with another. Every state has their own problem: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
Some people are destroying Nature, they are destroying the greenery and environment. We must protect Nature: WB CM #FacebookTalksLive
We have set up a land bank after coming to power. We have a policy against forceful acquisition: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
There is a misconception that Singur movement was against industry. It is wrong: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
Health for all and education for all - our priorities for the welfare of poor people: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
We stand by the downtrodden. Our party is of the poor people, by the poor people, for the poor people: WB CM #FacebookTalksLive
I will never bow down my head, if the interest of common people is involved. But if it is their interest, i will bow down my head: WB CM
We have a manifesto. We enter an alliance considering that our manifesto is not violated. We cannot cheat people: Didi #FacebookTalksLive
I maintain good personal relations with many leaders, but politically they hate me. There is no cure for jealousy: Didi #FacebookTalksLive
Out of 42 seats today, we have nominated 30% women: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
We must work for the under-privileged, whether it is religious minorities, women, backward classes: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
I consider myself as a human being first, not as a woman. We must work for all: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
We must bring tribal people to the mainstream. We have have to reach out to them: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
We give rice at Rs 2/kg to people of Jangalmahal. We have recruited youth from that area to police: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
Even Central Govt has declared our handling of Jangalmahal as a model: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
Jangalmahal was a hotbed of Maoism. Now incidents of violence there is zero: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
We don't support killing people for the sake of politics. We condemn violence: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
I don't know the Aam Admy Party, so i cannot comment about them: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
Anna ji is a respected person. He raised some issues, which we agreed with. He touched our hearts: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
New economic policy which is pro-people, industry-friendly & agriculture-friendly - this is our development agenda: WB CM #FacebookTalksLive
Govt cannot bulldoze its way on sensitive issues. We must consult all parties for that: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
DVC is investing Rs 10000 crores in Bengal : Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
New industries have started in WB. NTPC is investing in Katwa. SAIL is investing Rs 20000 crores: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
If you have vision and plan of action, there is no contradiction between industry and agriculture: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
We have conducted 54 block level administrative meetings in the last 3 years: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
Sitting in Delhi and giving bhashan is not the job of a leader. Govt must go to the districts: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
Centre takes away Rs 70000 crores from our treasury. Yet, we have achieved a GSDP double the national average: WB CM #FacebookTalksLive
India needs policies which are industry-friendly, agriculture-friendly and helps the country's GDP: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
Your commitment is your credential. Transparency and accountability matter a lot: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
There is no new outlook. There is no vision. Without vision, there is no mission: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
There is no new leadership in India. During every election, only feudal landlords are selected: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
A new phenomenon started in India post Indira Gandhi's assassination: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
Trust the people. Let the voters decide who will be the next PM. Let us not decide that right now: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
I have a Facebook account. I hope they will watch this interview and listen to my points: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive
Please don't call me a candidate. I will answer your questions as a common citizen of this country: Trinamool Chairperson #FacebookTalksLive

Thank you for joining us in the interview with Mukul Roy.
There has been a huge decline in the rate of political killings in the state. We believe in change, not revenge: Mukul Roy
Congress party itself has become irrelevant in Bengal: Mukul Roy
Mamata Banerjee maintains a fine line of separation between the party and the government. She never mixes the two: Mukul Roy
দলের কাজ করার সততা আর যোগ্যতা যার আছে, তাকেই দলের কাজে লাগাবো। বেনো জলের প্রশ্নই ওঠেনা : মুকুল রায়
বাংলার মানুষ মমতা বন্দ্যোপাধ্যায়কে নিয়ে খুশি আছে। অন্য কোনো বিকল্প নেই: মুকুল রায়
We do not agree that there is a wave in favour of any party or individual in the country: Mukul Roy
তৃনমূল রাজ্যের ৪২ টি আসনেই লড়বে। অন্য কোনো দলের প্রার্থীকে সমর্থন করার কোনো প্রশ্নই ওঠেনা : মুকুল রায়
Trinamool will fight on all 42 seats in Bengal. There is no question of supporting any other party's candidate: Mukul Roy
The party, at any level, has not taken any decision on candidates for LS. The rumours floating around are figments of imagination: Mukul Roy
What certain political formations in Darjeeling will do, is their prerogative. We will consolidate our strength: Mukul Roy
Darjeeling is the heart of Bengal. The Hills are an inseparable part of the state. This is our stand: Mukul Roy
People would have to visit Jangalmahal to believe the amount of development done there: Mukul Roy
মানুষমাত্রেই ভুল হয়। আমাদেরও হয়েছে। কিন্তু আমাদের ভালো কাজ গুলো মিডিয়াতে বলা হচ্ছেনা: মুকুল রায়
Everyone is liable to make mistakes. We also made some slips. But our good work never gets highlighted in media: Mukul Roy
যখন আমরা দেখলাম কেন্দ্রীয় সরকার আমাদের ঘোষিত মেনিফেস্টোর পরিপন্থী কাজ করছে, আমরা সমর্থন প্রত্যাহার করেছি: মুকুল রায়
মুল্যবৃদ্ধি থেকে শুরু করে সারের দাম বারা কিংবা পেট্রোল ডিজেলের দাম - তৃনমূল সবসময় প্রতিবাদ করেছে: মুকুল রায়
We also pulled the plug when we saw the actions of UPA Govt were against the manifesto of Trinamool: Mukul Roy
We have always protested against price rise, uncontrolled rise of prices of fertilisers, deregulating fuel prices: Mukul Roy
অনেকেই ২০১৩-র পঞ্চায়েত নির্বাচনের সময় বলেছিল তৃনমূল ভালো ফল করবেনা। আমরা ভালো ফল করেছি: মুকুল রায়
Many psephologists predicted Trinamool will not perform well in Panchayat polls. But we did very well: Mukul Roy on opinion polls
WB has never got a proper voice nationally. This time round people will vote heavily for Trinamool so that Bengal gains relevance: Mukul Roy
Naxal terror is a big problem facing India right now. But ultimately, Mamata Banerjee successfully brought peace to Jangalmahal: Mukul Roy
বুদ্ধদেব ভট্টাচার্যের বিরুদ্ধে আমার কিছু বলার নেই।  ওনার নিজের দলের উপ পরিষদীয় নেতা ওনাকে অন্ধকারের রাজা বলেন: মুকুল রায়
বুদ্ধবাবু প্রাসঙ্গিকতা হারিয়ে ফেলেছেন। উনি কি বললেন, তা আমি ধর্তব্যের মধ্যে আনিনা : মুকুল রায়
I have no grudge against Buddhadeb Bhattacharya. Their own party leaders call him the Lord of Darkness. He has lost all relevance: Mukul Roy
তৃনমূল একক ভাবে লড়তে পারে। আমরা ২০১১র পর একের পর এক নির্বাচনে একা লড়ে জিতেছি: মুকুল রায়
আমাদের লড়াই দুর্নীতি, সাম্প্রদায়িকতা ও বৈষম্যের বিরুদ্ধে: মুকুল রায়
পশ্চিমবঙ্গে গত আড়াই বছরে যা উন্নয়ন হয়েছে, সেটাই আমরা তুলে ধরব লোকসভা নির্বাচনের প্রচারে: মুকুল রায়
আগামী লোকসভা নির্বাচনের পর তৃনমূল নির্ণায়ক শক্তি হিসেবে আসবে: মুকুল রায়
After 2011, we have fought several elections alone. The results have shown Trinamool is capable of fighting without allies: Mukul Roy
Our fight is against corruption and communalism in the upcoming Lok Sabha polls: Mukul Roy
Trinamool Congress will be a deciding factor in forming the next government at the Centre: Mukul Roy
Unlike the past elections, we have expanded outside Bengal this time. Mamata Banerjee is a national leader: Mukul Roy
The 16th Lok Sabha will be formed with a fractured mandate. Every party knows it well: Mukul Roy
The parties which have been accredited national status by the Election Commission, will lose their relevance after 2014 polls: Mukul Roy
My only choice for the post of PM is Mamata Banerjee: Mukul Roy
